website_summaries.verdict: With its summer-ready design, the Sperry Striper II CVO Nautical offers much in the way of style. It's perfect for different kinds of adventures in the city, featuring a versatile appeal that can be paired with a lot of choices. This kick from the Sperry sneaker line is also made to be comfortable. It has excellent arch support and has a budget-friendly price, making it an all-around desirable model to have in one's closet. However, it's useful to note that the sneaker is said to run wide.
pros: More than a handful of reviewers have observed that the Sperry Striper II CVO Nautical is well-made and durable
A few testers have attested that the shoe is versatile and goes with a lot of outfits
The model is budget-friendly, with at least a couple of users saying that the sneaker is of great value for its price
The Sperry Striper II CVO Nautical is stylish, cool, and nice-looking, most buyers have admired
A few individuals share that they are looking forward to getting another pair
Several wearers commend the sneaker for its high level of comfort
According to some commenters, the Sperry Striper II CVO Nautical is perfect as a summer shoe
At least one reviewer has imparted that the model is a welcome upgrade from the Sperry Striper sneaker collection
The colored stripe on the foxing provides a nice touch, a couple of testers have praised
There’s moderate arch support in the Sperry Striper II CVO Nautical, some users have detected
cons: A lot of commenters have perceived that the shoe runs wide, even for those with wide feet

customer_reviews.title: Classic Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved the classic look of these particular Sperrys and the ease in cleaning them. Just toss them in the wash with a capful of bleach, sun dry, and you're good to go. I wear a size 14 B (my feet aren't wide) and normally wear these with no-show socks though sometimes without. Either way, there is quite a bit of room in the toe area than I'm not used to with my other nice fitting shoes. It almost feels like I could have gone down a size. With as much confusion there is on the fit of Sperrys, I highly suggest at least trying the pair locally before ordering, or ordering from vendors that allow returns for fitting.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Love. Sperry never disappoints me
customer_reviews.text: Love. Sperry never disappoints me. Order 1/2 size smaller. I always spray with scotchguard fabric protectant too. They clean up easier that way.
customer_reviews.author: RDH

customer_reviews.title: Wear only in a Clean Room!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Sperry, but this shoe, forget it, you have to keep them upside down or you see dust!!! REALLY nice style, but too white with a material thats not fun to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sunther

customer_reviews.title: Full size to large. Order 1 size down
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes, just what I wanted. However they are a ful size below what I wear. I contemplated keeping them but it’s just not my size. I’m retiring for the correct fit. (1) full size down. Wow
customer_reviews.author: Auto Doc.

customer_reviews.title: Luckily Amazon makes for an easy swap and the shoes themselves are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've worn a size 11 for the l30+ years but for this shoe I needed a 10.5. Luckily Amazon makes for an easy swap and the shoes themselves are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cahoon

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Way more comfy than my standard Sperry's. A bit of cushion!
customer_reviews.author: Andy S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent materials and craftsmanship. Perfect fit. Excellent value. Well packaged and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Don Lagerberg

customer_reviews.title: Good looks and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair or me, comfortable, good looking and excellent for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: CSR

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping came a little earlier than expected. I usually wear a size 10 but before ordering and since I couldn't get a hold of this model anywhere at my local mall I found out while trying other shoes from the same brand that my usual size was a little too big, so I went ahead with a 9.5. So far I'm pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Diorfes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look good, fit well, and are comfortable enough to walk city streets in.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Stull

customer_reviews.title: Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love a good boat shoe.. There were on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Run way too big
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for me college aged son. He has worn a size 13 shoe for years. Bought him these in a size 13. He was home for the weekend recently. He tried on the shoes and they were way too big! They weren't just slightly too big. They were a whole size too big! Unfortunately, the return window closed two days ago!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin A. Hardenbrook

customer_reviews.title: Great old school casual shoe looks great Like Vans
customer_reviews.text: Great old school casual shoe looks great Like Vans, but these are very comfortable. Of course, being canvas difficult to keep clean but I just throw them in the washer once in awhile
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Comfort
customer_reviews.text: First time buying Sperrys. I’ve been wearing these around the house everyday since they came in. I’m very satisfied with the quality and comfort. The fit is a little big; I usually wear 9 1/2 so I got these in size 9. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Wade C. Weitlauf

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. I was worried when I got them because ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I was worried when I got them because they seem more stiff than shoes I usually wear. But they’re comfortable to wear and look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Claggett

customer_reviews.title: Size fitted as expected
customer_reviews.text: It came really good and as expected, shipping was great
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my son this year I tried them on and really liked them Wish I had bought pair for me Color is great and fit well as well as comfortable too Probably going to get myself a pair
customer_reviews.author: Frontosa

product_meta.title: Sperry Top-Sider Men's Striper II CVO Nautical Sneaker, Grey, 7 M US
product_meta.description: The Sperry® Striper II CVO Nautical sneaker is a slightly slimmed down version of the beloved classic deck shoe. Breathable canvas upper. Traditional lace-up system with sturdy metal eyelets and fabric laces for a secure fit. Vulcanized construction provides a secure bond between upper and outsole. Soft textile lining for added interior comfort. Cushioned removable footbed conforms to the foot for comfort. Nonmarking rubber outsole with Wave-Siping™ for the ultimate traction on wet and dry surfaces. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 14 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11.5, width M (D). Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Lightweight, flexible vulcanized construction with secure bonding between upper and outsole
Molded Wave-Siping delivers ultimate wet/dry traction with non-marking rubber outsoles
Removable full-length molded PU footbed for all-day comfort
